c:atomType.name: AxisDomainRoundingMode
c:atomType.c:documentation: The rounding mode applied to a numeric axis' scale domain.

c:atom.name: None
c:atom.c:documentation: The scale domain is exactly the domain of the data.

c:atom.name: Nice
c:atom.c:documentation: The scale domain is made "nice" by ensuring that its bounds are "nice" numbers, extending the domain, if necessary.

c:atom.name: Tick
c:atom.c:documentation:
The scale domain is extended in order to coincide with the calculated ticks.
Ticks naturally are nice numbers, yet, additionally, this mode ensures that ticks coincide with the end of the axis' scale, as long as the axis'
is zero.
